price: (23) Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muḥammad], the Qur’ān progressively.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā ʿalayka al-qur'āna tanzīlan
